title: Joeyp
author: Joeyp
created_time: October 23, 2023, 05:37:48 PMLast edit: October 23, 2023, 08:45:30 PM by Joeyp
content: There are many various wallets already and also various problems with them. For example, with Electrum, Atomic and Coinomi wallets.So would be wise to have the general thread about various wallets in Wallet software board, like this one -     [General] Bitcoin Wallets - Which, what, why?.But the problem is that this thread is already in Beginners & Help board for newbies, and to have it in another board too can be complicated task for admin.May be forum members can help, how to solve the problem ? For example, just make the second duplicate thread, and then make changes in both threads.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I don't think we need a more specific board for Atomic and Coinomi wallets in the wallet software board because this section is only for Bitcoin wallets.Maybe it would be fit to put these two wallets in the altcoin section.About the sticky thread "[General] Bitcoin Wallets" it should fit on "Beginners & Help" You don't need to duplicate this but you can try to make a new thread with some improvements just make sure it is far from plagiarism and post it to the board you want to post it then request for mods to pin this thread.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I guess most people here misunderstand OP, he doesn't want another sub-board for every wallet mentioned but a general thread instead each one of them. Its understandable to have it but it doesn't have to be a general thread, unless a representative of the wallet service make a thread about them there to explain what they have and all its features.Wallet software board are more on issues encountered using specific wallet, discussions, and other questions so let the community ask something related to them there.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Joeyp on October 23, 2023, 05:37:48 PMSo would be wise to have the general thread about various wallets in Wallet software board, like this one If i understood you correctly, you want a general megathread for wallets that do not have their own child board under the wallet software child board, discussing about different wallets in one single megathread would really be messy. Individual megathreads for it might make more sense, but still users would need to create their own new thread in the wallet software child board, because it can easily be missed or ignored if posted in the megathread. Imo, nothing needs to change there and if the wallet you want to discuss about doesn't have its own child board, just post it in wallet software.
